title: A mysterious box appears…
description: Should we open the tome of wonders?
choiceOne_consequences: A holographic mouse pops out of the box and says in a tiny whisper 'Psst..did you know? The pilot crew of this space station are supposedly the best of the best! But how did they get so good...'
choiceTwo_consequences: The tome disappears into galactic space. Phew…nothing bad happened.

title: The bribe
description: One of the teams wants to bribe the Promoter! Should we let them?
choiceOne_description: I wonder what they will use as a bribe?
choiceOne_consequences: Bribing team gains a snifty new sharpy cool attitude (that is very popular) but some other teams now look down upon them
choiceTwo_description: The Promoter cannot be bought and sold!
choiceTwo_consequences: Moral purity has been maintained. Fan adoration sky rockets!

title: The Consummation
description: One dancer eats and absorbs it's partner to become the ultimate dancer, do we penalize them?
choiceOne_description: Such actions must be punishable to maintain order
choiceOne_consequences: The change is hard and they fart out the cries of agony of their consumed partner
choiceTwo_description: The stress of the competition made it inevitable.

title: Our Direction
description: The navigation system has failed us, do we trust the pilot crew or do we reactivate the system?
choiceOne_description: Our energy is better used elsewhere
choiceOne_consequences: A few technical glitches but we seem to be alright. The end of the universe is close.
choiceTwo_description: We don't want to get lost!
choiceTwo_consequences: We struggle, one team loses all their briefcase items/personal possessions. The end of the universe is close.

title: What do others think about us?
description: Protest is happening all over the galaxies. They claim that there is an alternative way to birth the new universe rather than by dance marathon. Should we abandon the dance or keep going?
choiceOne_description: What if there is a better way?
choiceOne_consequences: The new universe is born! But who..or what.. has shaped it?
choiceTwo_description: We've heard these stories before, let them take their chances
choiceTwo_consequences: The new universe is born! How do we deal with what we have become?
